vote.title: Authorize the Investment Partnerships Program (HOME) development loan agreement and security documents in an amount of $2,500,000.00 in HOME Funds with Kiva East, LLC (“Kiva East”), or an affiliate thereof, conditioned upon Kiva East receiving a 2021 9% Housing Tax Credit award for the acquisition and development of a mixed-income affordable multifamily complex located at 4724 and 4806 East Side Avenue - Not to exceed $2,500,000.00 - Financing: HOME Funds
vote.description: Authorize the Investment Partnerships Program (HOME) development loan agreement and security documents in an amount of $2,500,000.00 in HOME Funds with Kiva East, LLC (“Kiva East”), or an affiliate thereof, conditioned upon Kiva East receiving a 2021 9% Housing Tax Credit award for the acquisition and development of a mixed-income affordable multifamily complex located at 4724 and 4806 East Side Avenue - Not to exceed $2,500,000.00 - Financing: HOME Funds
